recipe.title: Brownies
recipe.ingredients: 140g plain flour 20g cocoa powder 200g caster sugar 80mL vegetable oil 1 tsp vanilla extract 200g dairy free dark chocolate, melted 240mL almond milk 75g dairy free chocolate chips, optiona

method.step: Preheat oven to 160oC. Line 8 inch square baking tray with baking paper.
In a large mixing bowl, add flour, cocoa powder and sugar, and gently whisk to mix.
Add oil, vanilla, melted chocolate and almond milk. Mix with a spatula until smooth and combined. Add chocolate chips and mix gently.
Transfer brownie batter to prepared pan and bake for 25-30 minutes or until a skewer inserted in the middle comes out clean. Try not to over back or brownies will turn ‘cake-y’.
Let the brownies cool in the baking tray
Cut into 16 pieces and store in for a few hours to firm them up and make them super fudge-y.
